short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save images from any website directly into your Substratum collections.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Substratum Chrome extension allows you to easily save any image from a website with a couple of clicks.

---
This extension is currently in Beta and we are continuously improving it. If you are experiencing any issue, contact us at support@substratum.app. We'll be happy to help you!
